package.name: libmatchbox
package.build: cd ${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION} if [ -n "$DISTCC_POTENTIAL_HOSTS" ] ; then jobcount=` expr $DISTCC_HOSTCOUNT '*' 2 ` export CC="distcc gcc" export CXX="distcc g++" LDFLAGS='-L/usr/compat.old/lib -lX11' CFLAGS='-I/usr/compat.old/include' CXXFLAGS='-I/usr/compat.old/include' \ ./configure --prefix=/usr/compat.old --sysconfdir=/etc/compat.old --enable-pango --enable-xsettings CC="distcc gcc" CXX="distcc g++" pump make -j $jobcount CC="distcc gcc" CXX="distcc g++" else LDFLAGS='-L/usr/compat.old/lib -lX11' CFLAGS='-I/usr/compat.old/include' CXXFLAGS='-I/usr/compat.old/include' \ ./configure --prefix=/usr/compat.old --sysconfdir=/etc/compat.old --enable-pango --enable-xsettings make fi
